name: Blue Box (Neo Dev)
description:
This is my first ever game

The gameplay is simple. You just have to avoid the red circles aka "Enemies" and their projectiles and kill them by shooting. There is an ammo system to avoid you from spamming bullets all around and their are also a few powerups to help you.

Controls: Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move and Left Click where you want to shoot
